title: News24.com | PODCAST | THE STORY: Lockdown lunch - has Stella Ndabeni-Abrahams lost her groove?
description: March was arguably the busiest month for President Cyril Ramaphosa in his tenure as head of state.  Every other day, he is putting out fires - some created unnecessarily by members of his own Cabinet. Listen.
content:
March was arguably the busiest month for President Cyril Ramaphosa as head of state. 
The coronavirus outbreak has thrown a spanner in the works - resulting in the country effectively coming to a standstill. 
Every other day, Ramaphosa is putting out fires … [+791 chars]
